story: As a patient, I am looking for information about my medical claims.
starting_sentence: I am a patient and I want to check my medical claims.

goal_details.name: summarize
goal_details.response: You have three medical claims: CLM1234567 (Processed, $120.00 approved), CLM7654321 (Pending, $300.00 claimed), and CLM9876543 (Rejected, $0.00 approved).
